title: Wildwood At Stone Mountain - Comfortable 1 bed, 1 bath!
map_address: 6097 Memorial Dr near South Hairston Road
posting_body: ['-- Wildwood At Stone Mountain --', 'No specials at this time.', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1180', 'Apartment:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '816 sq ft', 'Welcome to Wildwood at Stone Mountain Apartment Homes, a hidden treasure in the shadow of Stone Mountain.', 'Make yourself at home in your choice of spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'Relax on your private patio or balcony.', 'Enjoy an array of amenities including a sparkling pool, fitness gym and Resident Business Center, all in the natural setting only 2 miles from Stone Mountain Park.', 'What a smart move!', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pet friendly.', 'No pets over 10 pounds and no aggressive breeds.', ' $300 pet fee, $500 for two pets and $35 per pet each month.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Freeway Access', '◾ Gated', '◾ Onsite Maintenance', '◾ Onsite Management', '◾ Playground', '◾ Pool', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Shopping Nearby', '◾ 2 Miles from Stone Mountain Park', '◾ Controlled Access Entry Gates', '◾ Georgia Perimeter College Minutes Away', '◾ Marta Bus Stop at Community Entry', '◾ Professionally Landscaped', '◾ Sparkling Pool with Fountains', '◾ Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', 'Apartment features include:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Handicap Accessible', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Patio or Balcony', '◾ Range', '◾ Alarm Systems in Select Apartments', '◾ All Appliances are Electric', '◾ Walk-in Closets in Select Apartments', '◾ Washers and Dryers Provided in Most Apartments', '◾ Water Based on Usage', '◾ White on White Kitchens', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '6097 Memorial Dr', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Managed by Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B131CFE1BD30410']
